Post.title: Travis CIhexo
Post._content:
hexogithubhtmlrepositoryMarkdownhexo

push mdTravis CItool

<!--more-->

# Personal access tokens
github, settings -> Personal access tokens -> Generate new token
token descriptionhexo deploy.
repogistcreate.
token,
![personal_access_token.png](/img/personal_access_token.png)

# Travis CI
1. https://travis-ci.org, githubrepository
2. Environment Variables: DEPLOY_REPOtokenDisplay value in build log
![travis_ci_setting.png](/img/travis_ci_setting.png)

3. check token
```bash
apt-get install ruby # gemruby
gem install travis
travis login --github-token 'token' # tokentoken
travis whoami # 
```

# .travis.yml
1. hexorepositorybranch rawmd
```bash
git branch raw
git checkout raw
git add --all .
git push origin raw
```
2. .travis.ymlpushraw branch
refer to: https://github.com/magicse7en/magicse7en.github.io/blob/raw/.travis.yml
branchonly raw
```
branches:
  only:
    - raw
```

# Test
```bash
hexo new "xxx"
git add --all .
git push origin raw
```
travis-ci.org check build log, build OK.
![travis_ci_build_status.png](/img/travis_ci_build_status.png)
build OK, checkpost

# 
## 1 travis CIgithub
psersonal tokentravis whoamitokentravis CI environment variable

## 2travis CIhexo-renderer-sass
deploytravis vm.travis.yml
```bash
npm install hexo-renderer-sass --save
```

## 3 travis CI
landscapenext themecheckthemes/next ignorepushraw branch.

 - .gitmodulesnext theme repository importnext theme
 ```
 [submodule "next"]
    path = themes/next
    url = https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next
 ```
 - themes/next.git.gitignorethemes/nextpushrepository

# Others
1. .travis.ymlnode_modulescache
```
cache:
  directories:
    - node_modules
```
2. githubREADME.mdREADME.md
```
[build-info](https://travis-ci.org/userName/repoName.svg)
```
![travis_ci_build_info_show.png](/img/travis_ci_build_info_show.png)


# Reference
Travis CIhexo
![travis-ci-work-flow.png](/img/travis-ci-work-flow.png)

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

date: 2016/3/4

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

Post.title: Ubuntu + Github + Hexoblog
Post._content:
JekyllHexo
Hexo+Github

# Install Git & Github
## Install git
```bash
apt-get install git
```
usernameemail
```bash
git config --global user.name "xxx"
git config --global user.email "xxx@xxx.com"
```
## Generate ssh-key
```{bash}
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "xxx@xxx.com"
```
Github.ssh/id_rsa.pubGithubSettings-> SSH Keys-> New SSH Key
```{bash}
ssh -T git@github.com
```

> The authenticity of host 'github.com (207.97.227.239)' can't be established.RSA key fingerprint is 16:27:ac:a5:76:28:2d:36:63:1b:56:4d:eb:df:a6:48.Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no)?

yes

>Hi xxx! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.

## Create Repository
GithubId.github.io

<!--more-->

# Install NodeJs
Nodejstarball->->
```bash
ln -s /home/xxx/Software/node-v4.3.2-linux-x64/bin/node /usr/local/bin/node
ln -s /home/xxx/Software/node-v4.3.2-linux-x64/bin/npm /usr/local/bin/npm
```

# Install Hexo
docs: https://hexo.io/docs/
```bash
npm install -g hexo
mkdir hexo
ln -s /home/xxx/Software/node-v4.3.2-linux-x64/bin/hexo /usr/local/bin/hexo
hexo init
hexo generate
hexo server #server,  http://localhost:4000 
```

*_config.yml*type
```bash
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: https://github.com/githubid/githubid.github.io.git
  branch: master
```
https://githubid.github.io 
```bash
npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
hexo deploy
```

# Generate & Deploy

```bash
hexo new hello-hexo
```
Markdownsource/_posts/hell-hexo.md
hexo generateserver: hexo server
github:
hexo deploy

deployclean
```bash
hexo clean
```


```bash
hexo g -d
```

# Themes configuration
Next: [http://theme-next.iissnan.com]

Post.title: lzo decompress kernel zImage crash analysis
Post._content:
# Background
CPU: ARMv7
Kernel: 3.10.26

kernelgziplzobootkernelCPUabort. 

<!--more-->

# Debug
checkkernellzocheck arch/arm/boot/compressedpiggy.lzocheckflashloadzImagekernelDRAMzImagedatacrashcheck DRAMzImage datazImage src data

debugC code**include/linux/unaligned/le_struct.h**
```c
static inline u16 get_unaligned_le16(const void *p)
{
    return __get_unaligned_cpu16((const u8 *)p);
}
```

```asm
ldrh r12, [r8], #02
```
r80x04000003checkkernel configconfig. DFARDFSR registerFault Status bits0x1, ARMalignment fault.
>FS[3:0]	 Fault Status bits. This field indicates the type of exception generated. Any encoding not listed is reserved:
>       **0b00001 Alignment fault.**
>       0b00010 Debug event.
>       0b00011 Access flag fault, section.
>       0b00100 Instruction cache maintenance fault.
>       0b00101 Translation fault, section.
>       0b00110 Access flag fault, page.
>       0b00111 Translation fault, page.
>       0b01000 Synchronous external abort, non-translation.
>       0b01001 Domain fault, section.
>       0b01011 Domain fault, page.
>       0b01100 Synchronous external abort on translation table walk, first level.
>       0b01101 Permission fault, section.
>       0b01110 Synchronous external abort on translation table walk, second level.
>       0b01111 Permission fault, second level.
>       0b10000 TLB conflict abort.
>       0b10101 LDREX or STREX abort.
>       0b10110 Asynchronous external abort.
>       0b11000 Asynchronous parity error on memory access.
>       0b11001 Synchronous parity error on memory access.
>       0b11100 Synchronous parity error on translation table walk, first level.
>       0b11110 Synchronous parity error on translation table walk, second level.
    
debug, r8crashblockmemorymemorycheck MMU tablecrashmemoryouter, Devicemappingmemory

check kernelMMU tablemapping
**arch/arm/boot/compressed/head.S**
```c
__setup_mmu:    sub     r3, r4, #16384          @ Page directory size
                 bic     r3, r3, #0xff           @ Align the pointer
                 bic     r3, r3, #0x3f00
 /*
  * Initialise the page tables, turning on the cacheable and bufferable
  * bits for the RAM area only.
  */
                 mov     r0, r3
                 mov     r9, r0, lsr #18
                 mov     r9, r9, lsl #18         @ start of RAM
                 add     r10, r9, #0x10000000    @ a reasonable RAM size
                 mov     r1, #0x12               @ XN|U + section mapping
                 orr     r1, r1, #3 << 10        @ AP=11
                 add     r2, r3, #16384
 1:              cmp     r1, r9                  @ if virt > start of RAM
                 cmphs   r10, r1                 @   && end of RAM > virt
                 bic     r1, r1, #0x1c           @ clear XN|U + C + B
                 orrlo   r1, r1, #0x10           @ Set XN|U for non-RAM
                 orrhs   r1, r1, r6              @ set RAM section settings
                 str     r1, [r0], #4            @ 1:1 mapping
                 add     r1, r1, #1048576
                 teq     r0, r2
                 bne     1b
```
codemapping

# RootCause
uImagezImageexecute addresscodeMMU
Post.raw:
---
title: lzo decompress kernel zImage crash analysis
date: 2016-03-08 23:05:08
tags: [lzo,zImage]
categories: Linux
---

# Background
CPU: ARMv7
Kernel: 3.10.26

kernelgziplzobootkernelCPUabort. 

<!--more-->

# Debug
checkkernellzocheck arch/arm/boot/compressedpiggy.lzocheckflashloadzImagekernelDRAMzImagedatacrashcheck DRAMzImage datazImage src data

debugC code**include/linux/unaligned/le_struct.h**
```c
static inline u16 get_unaligned_le16(const void *p)
{
    return __get_unaligned_cpu16((const u8 *)p);
}
```

```asm
ldrh r12, [r8], #02
```
r80x04000003checkkernel configconfig. DFARDFSR registerFault Status bits0x1, ARMalignment fault.
>FS[3:0]	 Fault Status bits. This field indicates the type of exception generated. Any encoding not listed is reserved:
>       **0b00001 Alignment fault.**
>       0b00010 Debug event.
>       0b00011 Access flag fault, section.
>       0b00100 Instruction cache maintenance fault.
>       0b00101 Translation fault, section.
>       0b00110 Access flag fault, page.
>       0b00111 Translation fault, page.
>       0b01000 Synchronous external abort, non-translation.
>       0b01001 Domain fault, section.
>       0b01011 Domain fault, page.
>       0b01100 Synchronous external abort on translation table walk, first level.
>       0b01101 Permission fault, section.
>       0b01110 Synchronous external abort on translation table walk, second level.
>       0b01111 Permission fault, second level.
>       0b10000 TLB conflict abort.
>       0b10101 LDREX or STREX abort.
>       0b10110 Asynchronous external abort.
>       0b11000 Asynchronous parity error on memory access.
>       0b11001 Synchronous parity error on memory access.
>       0b11100 Synchronous parity error on translation table walk, first level.
>       0b11110 Synchronous parity error on translation table walk, second level.
    
debug, r8crashblockmemorymemorycheck MMU tablecrashmemoryouter, Devicemappingmemory

check kernelMMU tablemapping
**arch/arm/boot/compressed/head.S**
```c
__setup_mmu:    sub     r3, r4, #16384          @ Page directory size
                 bic     r3, r3, #0xff           @ Align the pointer
                 bic     r3, r3, #0x3f00
 /*
  * Initialise the page tables, turning on the cacheable and bufferable
  * bits for the RAM area only.
  */
                 mov     r0, r3
                 mov     r9, r0, lsr #18
                 mov     r9, r9, lsl #18         @ start of RAM
                 add     r10, r9, #0x10000000    @ a reasonable RAM size
                 mov     r1, #0x12               @ XN|U + section mapping
                 orr     r1, r1, #3 << 10        @ AP=11
                 add     r2, r3, #16384
 1:              cmp     r1, r9                  @ if virt > start of RAM
                 cmphs   r10, r1                 @   && end of RAM > virt
                 bic     r1, r1, #0x1c           @ clear XN|U + C + B
                 orrlo   r1, r1, #0x10           @ Set XN|U for non-RAM
                 orrhs   r1, r1, r6              @ set RAM section settings
```
